article.title: Harris Corporation To Supply Radios To Equip Mine-Resistant Ambush Protected Vehicles
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: The U.S. Defense Department has awarded Harris Corporation a $139 million order to provide additional Falcon II AN/VRC-104 high-frequency tactical radios to equip Joint Mine Resistant Ambush Protected (MRAP) vehicles. The radios will be installed in new standard-sized MRAP vehicles and MRAP All-Terrain Vehicles (M-ATVs).
